author: ozeigermann
msg: Added JAAS authentication contribution by Unico Hommes

author: ib
msg: Fix broken https support, still a bug needs to be fixed in Commons HttpClient

author: ozeigermann
msg: Locks and permissions were not included in a roll back as they had been
updated in a way not compliant with the tx cache. Fixed this...

author: pnever
msg: Added means for creating principals (users, roles, groups) through the MKCOL or PUT methods. Note that creating and maintaining principals is out of scope of the ACL specification. Now, Slide automcatically provides principals with DAV:displayname (last URI segment by default) and adds the DAV:principal element to its DAV:resourcetype property.
